content: the next upside­down v­stitch 5dc into first double_crochet of next v­stitch ch3 slip_stitch in first chain and 5 double_crochet in the second double_crochet of the v­stitch continue across completing ​8 scales row 3 ​ slip_stitch across to the point of the previous v­stitch chain 4 skip st double_crochet skip st double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet skip 1 stitch double_crochet chain 1 this makes our upside down v­stitch for our crocodile stitch repeat 14 times you should finish this row with ​13 upside­down v­stitches​ chain 1 double_crochet in last v­stitch from previous row row 4 ​slip_stitch up the double_crochet towards the base of the previous double_crochet chain 3 and 4 double_crochet in the first double_crochet of the v­stitch chain 3 slip_stitch in first chain and 5 double_crochet in the second double_crochet of the v­stitch slip_stitch into the skipped stitch of the next upside­down v­stitch 5dc into first double_crochet of next v­stitch ch3 slip_stitch in first chain and 5 double_crochet in the second double_crochet of the v­stitch continue across completing ​7 scales row 5­6 ​repeat decreasing procedure outlined in row 3­4 11 v­stitches and 6 scales row 7­8 ​ repeat decreasing procedure outlined in row 3­4 ​9 v­stitches and 5 scales row 9­10 ​ repeat decreasing procedure outlined in row 3­4 ​7 v­stitches and 4 scales row 11­12 ​repeat decreasing procedure outlined in row 3­4 ​ 5 v­stitches and 3 scales row 13­14 ​repeat decreasing procedure outlined in row 3­4 ​3 v­stitches and 2 scales row 15­14 ​repeat decreasing procedure outlined in row 3­4 ​1 v­stitch and 1 scale fasten_off finishing finishing will include adding straps adding a border to soften the edges of the scales along the neckline and steam blocking the finished piece straps around back row 1 ​ working on wrong side attach at corner see image working in back loops double_crochet 15 across row 2 ​chain 3 decrease double_crochet 4 decrease double_crochet 3 decrease double_crochet 12 double_crochet row 3 ​ chain 3 decrease double_crochet x4 8 double_crochet row 4 ​chain 3 decrease x3 double_crochet 5 double_crochet row 5 ​chain 3 decrease x2 3 double_crochet row 6 ​chain 3 decrease 2 double_crochet fasten_off repeat on other side straps around neck row 1 ​working on right side attach to final scale of cup double_crochet 7 across row 2 ​chain 3 decrease double_crochet decrease double_crochet 5 double_crochet row 3 ​ chain 3 decrease 2 double_crochet 4 double_crochet row 4 ​chain 3 dc2tpg double_crochet 3 double_crochet row 5 ​chain 3 decrease 2 double_crochet fasten_off repeat on other side smoothing the neckline working on right side attach to the top of row 1 on strap slip_stitch down to scale working on back loops work a single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet on first scale repeat down each scale at the center double_crochet into the chain space of the marked scale then reverse the pattern double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet smoothing the sides between back strap and neck strap working on right side attach to row 1 of neck strap slip_stitch down to scale working on back loops work
